Class ContinuousFunctionChartController

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.saiman.msapex.data.ContinuousFunctionChartController

  • public class ContinuousFunctionChartController
extends Object
    FXML controller for an annotatable data chart over a ContinuousFunction.

      • setDomain

        public void setDomain(double from,
                      double to)
        Move the view of the domain to contain exactly the interval between the given values.
        Parameters:
        from - The leftmost value in the domain to show in the view
        to - The rightmost value in the domain to show in the view
